pageContext.claim: “Paul Manafort -- the black book turned out to be a fraud. We learned that out during the various last number of weeks and months. They had a black book that came out of Ukraine. It turned out to be a fraud. It turned out to be a fraud. They convicted a man; it turned out to be a fraud.”
pageContext.analysis: This is nonsense. Manafort pleaded guilty to several charges of fraud and witness tampering based on voluminous evidence of wrongdoing and financial transactions.
